subject: Baseball
Hispanic-Americans
lead_paragraph: Omar Minaya tied the identity of the Mets to baseball’s Hispanic and Caribbean cultures. If Minaya does not return as general manager, it could signal the end of the Los Mets era.
snippet: Omar Minaya tied the identity of the Mets to baseball’s Hispanic and Caribbean cultures. If Minaya does not return as general manager, it could signal the end of the Los Mets era.
